name: Intro
commands: Oh quit your whining, we're here. This is Greshia.
MC I don't think teacher ever brought you here right?
Nope. Teach only ever took me to the east.|How do you know this place?
Greshia is one of the largest cities in the kingdom|Before I was taken in by teacher...back when I was with my caravan...|We used to stop by here often.
Ow! What was that for Schuri?
For making Senya have to bring up bad memories you dolt.
How was I supposed to know?
Thanks Schuri.|But MC is right, he couldn't have known
...Besides, I actually have fond memories of the place.|There's a tavern where everyone often visited.|..That's about as good of a place to start for this "Aesc"

Nah, it'll be easier on my own. Why don't you two ask some of the residents?|There should be pretty good shops here.|Pick up some gear for the rest of the journey.|When you two are ready I'll be waiting at the tavern.
Well... Schuri do you know Greshia well? Or are we both new here.
I've accompanied my father here a couple of times...|My father was considering an arranged marriage to one of the lords' sons.|I would have had to quit my studies but...
...Teach right? I was teach's last pupil so I only know some of the story|But he probably pulled some strings.

Indeed...Sir Cyrus requested to continue teaching me as he saw potential for me to become a high sage.|Truthfully I think he was lying to keep me safe...|I've always been told I had talent... but a high sage?
...|Schuri I may be a magical failure but anyone can tell you're meant for great things|Teach was a good man, I think he's capable of helping you get away from a noble creep|AND fufill your talent.
...Was Sir Cyrus' last lesson how to cheer me up?|...Thanks you dummie.
Gotta make sure I stay on your good side|That punch on the top of my head feels like its swelling a little....Hey Schuri?
I mean... you're the daughter of a noble right?|I thought you're supposed to talk all fancy like.
Bend down so I can hit you again...|I think whatever my punch did wore off.
Welp I'll uh head the shops first then! See ya bye!
That idiot!|I swear I'll...ugh|Come on Schuri, let's go talk to some people.
